package view;

import java.util.ArrayList;

import control.Lexico;
import entity.Token;

public class Principal {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		Lexico control = new Lexico();
		ArrayList<String> lineas = new ArrayList<String>();
		ArrayList<Token> tokens = new ArrayList<Token>();
		control.leer(lineas);
		control.ordenar(lineas, tokens);
		control.definir(tokens);
		for (int i = 0; i < tokens.size(); i++) {
			tokens.get(i).ver();
		}
		/*
		*
		String a = "perro <= Milton[]()\"";
		String[] b = new String[a.length()];
		for (int i = 0; i < b.length; i++) {
			b[i] = a.substring(i, i+1);
			System.out.println(b[i]);
			System.out.println("simbolo " + control.esSimbolo(b[i]));
			System.out.println("identificador " + control.esIdentificador(b[i]));
		}
		System.out.println(Arrays.toString(b));
		*
		*/
		//String c = "0XAf34";
		//System.out.println(control.esHexadecimal(c));

	}

}
